description:
* Based on a slice of life comedic manga by http://anidb.net/cr67367 [Yamada Hitsuji].
http://anidb.net/ch130235 [Saku] is an ordinary young woman who works long hours and lives alone with her cat, http://anidb.net/ch130236 [Yukichi]. Yukichi, however, is not an ordinary house cat. For one, the temperamental feline towers over Saku and walks around on two legs. Instead of playing with toy mice, he scours supermarket flyers for good deals and keeps the house spotless. With a pet like that, it’s hard to tell who’s taking care of who!
Source: Seven Seas Entertainment
Note: The first three episodes received an early screening at a special event on June 25, 2023 at United Cinemas Toyosu in Tokyo. The regular TV broadcast started on July 8, 2023.

REGULAR.description:
Saku Fukuzawa always brings a tasty lunch to work, but she swears she can`t cook. In fact, she seems like kind of a mess for someone who`s still single. Good thing she`s the owner of Yukichi, a masterful who can cook and clean like nobody`s business.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dekiru Neko wa Kyou mo Yuuutsu
The Masterful Cat Is Depressed Again Today
デキる猫は今日も憂鬱

REGULAR.description:
On that snowy night, Yukichi decided he would take care of the woman who saved him. Little did he know what he was getting himself into. Now, since Saku is freaking out that her superior might`ve met Yukichi in person, Yukichi silences her with alcohol.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dekiru Neko wa Ookiku Sodatta
The Masterful Cat Has Grown Big
デキる猫は大きく育った

REGULAR.description:
Yukichi is depressed again today, thinking about all the problems with his owner, Saku. How can an adult human who can`t even separate trash make it through life? Doing this and that, Yukichi takes care of Saku`s daily life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Masterful Cat Is Good at Giving Care
Dekiru Neko wa Osewa ga Dekiru
デキる猫はお世話がデキる

REGULAR.description:
The day of the aquarium event finally arrives! Saku keeps telling Yukichi that it`s not a date, but he seems to keep misunderstanding? Either way, she heads over to the aquarium and finds that Chief Orizuka has a little surprise with him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Masterful Cat Goes to the Aquarium
Dekiru Neko wa Suizokukan ni Iku
デキる猫は水族館に行く

REGULAR.description:
Saku and Yukichi receive invitations to Yume`s birthday party. Yukichi convinces Saku that it`ll be completely fine to attend since it`ll be a costume party. However, will Saku and Yukichi really be able to fool all the parents and children there?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Masterful Cat Also Goes to Birthday Parties
Dekiru Neko wa Otanjoukai ni mo Iku
デキる猫はお誕生会にも行く

REGULAR.description:
As the days get cooler, Saku wants to pull out their kotatsu. However, she had forgotten theirs had to be thrown out due to certain events. Later, Saku`s mother starts bothering her for pictures of Yukichi which causes a great photography dilemma.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Masterful Cat Is Photogenic
Dekiru Neko wa Shashin Utsuri ga Ii
デキる猫は写真映りがいい

REGULAR.description:
Saku`s coworkers bring up marriage, putting Saku into a panic. Would she be able to get married to someone while having Yukichi by her side?! What if the other person found out about his masterful skills? Her cat is too talented for her to get married!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Masterful Cat Is Able to DIY
Dekiru Neko wa DIY mo Dekiru
デキる猫はDIYもデキる

REGULAR.description:
There are many things to worry about lately. Yukichi finds Yume in a box with an abandoned kitten. There`s a flyer about a suspicious man who has been assaulting women at night in the neighborhood and Saku always comes home late...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Masterful Cat Has a Lot of Worries
Dekiru Neko wa Shinpai ga Ooi
デキる猫は心配が多い

REGULAR.description:
A masterful cat can not only take care of his owner and their home, he can also get along well with his neighbors. As a considerate cat, Yukichi does his part in the community by volunteering to help clean up the neighborhood park.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Masterful Cat Is Popular
Dekiru Neko wa Natsukareru
デキる猫は懐かれる

REGULAR.description:
Saku completely forgets about her company trip and suddenly has to prepare herself for two days without Yukichi by her side. She`s super worried, but Yukichi helps her prepare with ease. Though, his calm demeanor makes her feel even more lonely...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Masterful Cat Can Watch the House?
Dekiru Neko wa Rusuban ga Dekiru?
デキる猫は留守番がデキる?

REGULAR.description:
One day, Saku discovers that her skirt doesn`t quite fit like it used to. Yukichi freaks out and tries to limit her late night snacking, but Saku refuses. She`s sure she can lose it with exercise alone! Don`t take away her happiness in life!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Masterful Cat Also Cares About Health
Dekiru Neko wa Kenkou ni Ki o Tsukau
デキる猫は健康に気をつかう

REGULAR.description:
Many workers struggle with the Monday blues. However, Yuri and Oshiro find that Saku comes into work every Monday at the top of her game. Perhaps she knows of some kind of secret countermeasure?! In actuality, Saku only thinks about work and Yukichi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dekiru Neko wa Ie o Dete Iku?
The Masterful Cat Runs Away from Home?
デキる猫は家を出て行く?

REGULAR.description:
Yukichi reminisces about his past as he continues to spend his days with his worthless human. Though he has new worries every day, he manages to get by with is masterful skills. After all, he is the most masterful of cats.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dekiru Neko wa Asu mo Yuuutsu
The Masterful Cat Is Depressed Tomorrow as Well
デキる猫は明日も憂鬱

WIKIPEDIA_JP: デキる猫は今日も憂鬱

titles.title: Dekiru Neko wa Kyou mo Yuuutsu
The Masterful Cat Is Depressed Again Today
デキる猫は今日も憂鬱
能干的猫今天也忧郁
dekineko
能幹貓今天也憂鬱
